data.name: SKD
data.detailed_description:
SKD stands for Skyark Kids Defense! ..or Domination if you play a villain.. ..or Downtown if you're just super cool??.. Oh well It can stand for many things!

First, choose which character you wanna be-
-FURRY WARNING!- You WILL grow a TAIL in real life if you play this too much*
There's lots of characters split into 3 roles: FIGHTER / HUNTER / SUPPORT
Be it for their look, story, personality or skills you'll find one that fits you for sure! ..or if you think they are hot t-that's-.. uhm-.. YES!
Combat is very dynamic full of unique Character Skills to aim, dodge, counter.. Crazy ULTIMATES, and there's even some universal actions for everyone like a fighting game: Fake doing a skill, and Block!
Maining a character you love also rewards you with permanent level ups, talents and loot to showoff your loyalty, as you get better with them in more than 1 way! (they work in PvP too! But your skill as a player is still by far what matters the most!)

EPISODES

Each episode is a LONG epic PvE adventure you have to go through in one go, where you encounter various battles, spaced with lots of fun little character story scenes in between. There are 3 difficulties:
  • Story: great way to experience it and the story the first time alone without any pressure or if you wanna chill doing daily quest, you can have bots or local couch coop friends join you too!
  • Heroes: its the main one for 4 players! You and other random players online party together for a unique experience every time, and you can get permanent loot for your character! ..Oh yea this is not your typical baby mmorpg, there will be ruff wipes.. and there will also be epic saves and carry!
  • WOOF: I hope you and your group of friends are ready cuz you're about to get CLAPPED

3v3 BATTLES

Very inspired by Battlerite, its an epic PvP moba battle, all the time. No farming, no snowballing. Fight your best, KO all of them before they KO all of you, Best of 5 Rounds. Characters are thought of to play great and balanced for PvP first! Oh yea, and unlike mmorpgs you can very much dive straight into PvP with any character you like and ignore the rest of the game, it'll grow on you later don't worry about it!



Its also an indie game created by one person(doggy)! (its me im writing this in 3rd person to feel badass mmm im so badass yeaaahh)
That means if you find a character overpowered you MUST spam me, act very dominant *Grrr<3* I love it when you treat me like that

oh yea some people call it "funny" too idk about that one..

(hey guy working at Steam reviewing this, pls let it pass its very proffessional trust me bro

data.short_description: Be a cool furry character and adventure through epic Episodes with up to 4 others, and Battle in 3v3 with other players!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2500K CPU @ 3.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
